mapper.select: SELECT TROBL_ID, TROBL_NM, TROBL_KND, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM065' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND CODE = TROBL_KND) AS TROBL_KND_NM, TROBL_DC, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME, TROBL_RQESTER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_REQUST_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_REQUST_TIME, TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT, TROBL_OPETR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_PROCESS_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_PROCESS_TIME, PROCESS_STTUS, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM068' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND CODE = PROCESS_STTUS) AS PROCESS_STTUS_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNTROBLINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND TROBL_ID = #{troblId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNTROBLINFO SET TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT = #{troblProcessResult}, TROBL_OPETR_NM = #{troblOpetrNm}, TROBL_PROCESS_TIME = #{troblProcessTime}, PROCESS_STTUS = #{processSttus}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE TROBL_ID = #{troblId}

UPDATE COMTNTROBLINFO SET TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT = NULL, TROBL_OPETR_NM = NULL, TROBL_PROCESS_TIME = NULL, PROCESS_STTUS = #{processSttus}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE TROBL_ID = #{troblId}
